column5: In search of a great smallmouth bass fly in outpost. Prefer to be the only ones on the lake. Does anyone else love smallies on the surface like I do. Nothin better.
Check out www.hansonslodges.com they have a new fly in Cabin on an amazing Smally Lake, or www.happylandinglodge.com also great smallmouth fishing.
eh smally got lots of lakes no need for fly in it is at your disposal just email [email protected] will put you on all the smallies you want but they are not small, and you will see a great time
Hansons has NO smallmouth lakes. There has to be some remote outpost lakes loaded with smallmouth. Apparently everyone wants to keep them secret.
Smally.........E-mail me at [email protected], I can recommend a great smallmouth/musky lake. It's a fly-in or 6 hour portage.
Out of nestor through morrow and in?????????just wondering?

Why are you looking for a fly-in lake? If you want to fish the best smallmouth water in north america accorduing to in-fisherman you have to go to rainy lake in north western ontario, take a look at campfire island lodge, they run full american plan and everyone is guided. its a great place. www.campfireisland.com
